recipesJson.name: Banana milkshake
recipesJson.author: Gruspojken
recipesJson.description: Saw this on a recipe in their description. Dont remember who it was, but I really wanted to make a super simple recipe! Theres not enough banana recipes out there who dont use banana cream...

reviews.text: You can find it in Kelgar78 cause my friend here "couldnt remember" my name and my recipe.
